```{r, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, results = 'hide'}
source("../bin/chunk-options.R")
# apes <- c("Pongo", "Pan", "Gorilla", "Hoolock", "Homo")
# resolved_names <- rotl::tnrs_match_names(apes)
# apes_dr <- datelife::get_datelife_result(resolved_names$unique_name, get_spp_from_taxon = TRUE)
canis_node_ottids <- datelife::extract_ott_ids(canis_node_subtree$tip.label)
canis_node_ottids_taxon_info <- rotl::taxonomy_taxon_info(canis_node_ottids)
canis_node_ranks <- rotl::tax_rank(canis_node_ottids_taxon_info)
canis_node_species <- canis_node_ranks %in% "species"
canis_node_subtree_species <- rotl::tol_induced_subtree(canis_node_ottids[canis_node_species], label = "name")
canis_dr <- datelife::get_datelife_result(canis_node_subtree_species)
```

We can summarize it.
```{r, eval = TRUE, results = 'hide', message = FALSE}
canis_phylo_median <-  datelife::summarize_datelife_result(canis_dr,summary_format = "phylo_median")
```
```{r plot60, eval = TRUE, results= 'asis', warning= FALSE, error = TRUE, fig.height = 10}
canis_phylo_median
ape::plot.phylo(canis_phylo_median, cex = 1.2)
ape::axisPhylo()
````
